title: A House with Land for Sale
details:
A 44 perch land with a house for sale.
3 Bed rooms and 2 Tiled Bath rooms, Pantry kitchen, Office room, tiled living/seating area and dining room.
Situated 6.5km away from the main Kandy city.
Close proximity to the newly developed administrative center in Kundasale/Pallekele.
Walking distance to banks, supermarkets, channeling centers, religious places and other amenities. Few kms to prominent government/private schools in Kandy.
Clear deeds; pipe-borne water and electricity.
Safe and quite neighbourhood.
The Land could be developed into a commercial property.
(Sale of land in 20 perch and 24 perch blocks is also considered)
